text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines
text.Response A: Get your sizzix on with the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2! This steel-rule construction die can cut through 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, and sandpaper. It's compatible with the original Sizzix machine, as well as the bigkick and big shot machines. Go ahead and sizz it up!
text.Response B: Introducing the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2, a versatile and easy-to-use die that is compatible with the original Sizzix machine, the BigKick, and the Big Shot machines. With its steel-rule construction, this die can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, and sandpaper. The die is also a great size, measuring 2.75H x 4.75W, which makes it perfect for creating unique and personalized gifts, home decor, and more.

866.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines

Response A

Get your sizzix on with the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2! This steel-rule construction die can cut through 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, and sandpaper. It's compatible with the original Sizzix machine, as well as the bigkick and big shot machines. Go ahead and sizz it up!

Response B

Introducing the Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2, a versatile and easy-to-use die that is compatible with the original Sizzix machine, the BigKick, and the Big Shot machines. With its steel-rule construction, this die can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock, fabric foam, magnet, metallic foil, photos, vellum, and sandpaper. The die is also a great size, measuring 2.75H x 4.75W, which makes it perfect for creating unique and personalized gifts, home decor, and more.
